Verses: 1 visuvaasamaanadhu Nambappadugiravaigalin Urudhiyum, Kaanappadaadhavaigalin Nichchayamumaayirukkiradhu.
2 adhinaale Munnorgal Narsaatchipetraargal.
3 visuvaasaththinaale Naam Ulagangal Dhevanudaiya Vaarththaiyinaal Undaakkappattadhendrum, Ivvidhamaai, Kaanappadugiravaigal Thondrappadugiravaigalaal Undaagavillaiyendrum Arindhirukkirom.

4 visuvaasaththinaale Aabel Kaayeenudaiya Baliyilum Menmaiyaanabaliyai Dhevanukku Seluththinaan; Adhinaale Avan Needhimaanendru Saatchipetraan; Avanudaiya Kaanikkaigalaikkuriththu Dhevane Saatchikoduththaar; Avan Mariththum Innum Pesugiraan.

5 visuvaasaththinaale Enokku Maranaththai Kaanaadhapadikku Eduththukkollappattaan; Dhevan Avanai Eduththukkondapadiyinaale, Avan Kaanappadaamarponaan; Avan Dhevanukku Piriyamaanavanendru Avan Eduththukkollappaduvadharku Munname Saatchipetraan.

6 visuvaasamillaamal Dhevanukku Piriyamaayiruppadhu Koodaadhakaariyam; Enendraal, Dhevanidaththil Serugiravan Avar Undendrum, Avar Thammaiththedugiravargalukku Balan Alikkiravarendrum Visuvaasikkavendum.

7 visuvaasaththinaale Novaa Tharkaalaththile Kaanaadhavaigalaikkuriththu Dheva Echcharippuppetru, Bayabakdhiyullavanaagi, Than Kudumbaththai Ratchippadharku Pezhaiyai Undupanninaan; Adhinaale Avan Ulagam Aakkinaikkullaanadhendru Theerththu, Visuvaasaththinaalundaagum Needhikku Sudhandharavaaliyaanaan.
8 visuvaasaththinaale Aabirahaam Thaan Sudhandharamaagap Perappogira Idaththirku Pogumpadi Azhaikkappattapodhu, Keezhppadindhu, Thaan Pogum Idam Innadhendru Ariyaamal Purappattupponaan.

9 visuvaasaththinaale Avan Vaakkuththaththampannappatta Dhesaththile Paradhesiyaippola Sanjariththu, Andha Vaakkuththaththaththirku Udan Sudhandhararaagiya Eesaakkodum Yaakkobodum Koodaarangalile Kudiyirundhaan;
10 enenil, Dhevan Thaame Katti Undaakkina Asthibaarangalulla Nagaraththukku Avan Kaaththirundhaan.
11 visuvaasaththinaale Saaraalum Vaakkuththaththampanninavar Unmaiyullavarendrenni, Karppandharikka Belanadaindhu, Vayadhusendravalaayirundhum Pillaipetraal.

12 aanapadiyaal, Sareeranjseththavanendru Ennaththagum Oruvanaale, Vaanaththilulla Perukkamaana Natchaththirangalaippolavum Kadarkaraiyilulla Ennirandha Manalaippolavum, Migundha Janangal Pirandhaargal.

13 ivargalellaarum, Vaakkuththaththampannappattavaigalai Adaiyaamal, Dhooraththile Avaigalai Kandu, Nambi Anaiththukkondu, Boomiyinmel Thangalai Anniyarum Paradhesigalum Endru Arikkaiyittu, Visuvaasaththode Mariththaargal.
14 ippadi Arikkaiyidugiravargal Suyadhesaththai Naadippogirom Endru Theriyappaduththugiraargal.
15 thaangal Vittuvandha Dhesaththai Ninaiththaargalaanaal, Adharkuth Thirumbippovadharku Avargalukku Samayankidaiththirukkume.
16 adhaiyalla, Adhilum Menmaiyaana Paramadhesaththaiye Virumbinaargal; Aagaiyaal Dhevan Avargaludaiya Dhevanennappada Vetkappadugiradhillai; Avargalukku Oru Nagaraththai Aayaththampanninaare.
17 melum Visuvaasaththinaale Aabirahaam Thaan Sodhikkappattapodhu, Eesaakkai Baliyaaga Oppukkoduththaan
18 eesaakkinidaththil Un Sandhadhi Vilangum Endru Avanode Sollappattirundhadhe, Ippadippatta Vaakkuththaththangalai Petravan, Mariththorilirundhu Ezhuppa Dhevan Vallavaraayirukkiraarendrenni,
19 thanakku Oreperaanavanaiye Baliyaaga Oppukkoduththaan; Mariththorilirundhu Avanai Paavanaiyaaga Thirumbavum Petrukkondaan.
20 visuvaasaththinaale Eesaakku Varungaariyangalaikkuriththu Yaakkobaiyum Esaavaiyum Aaseervadhiththaan.
21 visuvaasaththinaale Yaakkobu Than Maranakaalaththil Yoseppinudaiya Kumaarar Iruvaraiyum Aaseervadhiththu, Than Kolin Munaiyile Saaindhu Thozhudhukondaan.
22 visuvaasaththinaale Yoseppu Isravel Puththirar Egipthu Dhesaththaivittu Purappaduvaargalenpadhaippatri Than Anniyakaalaththil Pesi, Than Elumpugalaikkuriththu Kattalaikoduththaan.
23 mose Pirandhapodhu Avanudaiya Thaaithagappanmaar Avanai Azhagulla Pillaiyendru Kandu, Visuvaasaththinaale, Raajaavinudaiya Kattalaikku Bayappadamal Avanai Moondrumaadham Oliththuvaiththaargal.
24 visuvaasaththinaale Mose Thaan Periyavanaanapodhu Paarvonudaiya Kumaaraththiyin Magan Ennappaduvadhai Veruththu,
25 aniththiyamaana Paava Sandhoshangalai Anubavippadhaippaarkkilum Dhevanudaiya Janangalode Thunbaththai Anubavippadhaiye Therindhukondu,
26 inivarum Balanmel Nokkamaayirundhu, Egipthilulla Pokkishangalilum Kiristhuvinimiththam Varum Nindhaiyai Adhiga Baakkiyamendru Enninaan.
27 visuvaasaththinaale Avan Adharisanamaanavaraith Tharisikkiradhupola Urudhiyaayirundhu, Raajaavin Kobaththukku Bayappadaamal Egipthaivittu Ponaan.
28 visuvaasaththinaale, Mudharperaanavaigalai Sangarikkiravan Isravelaraith Thodaathapadikku, Avan Paskaavaiyum Raththam Poosudhalaagiya Niyamaththaiyum Aasariththaan.
29 visuvaasaththinaale Avargal Sivandhasamuththiraththai Ularndha Tharaiyai Kadandhupovadhupola, Kadandhuponaargal; Egipthiyar Appadi Seyyaththunindhu Amizhndhuponaargal.
30 visuvaasaththinaale Erigo Pattanaththin Madhilgal Ezhunaal Sutrivarappattu Vizhundhadhu.
31 visuvaasaththinaale Raagaap Ennum Vesi Vevukaararai Samaadhaanaththode Etrukkondu, Keezhppadiyaadhavargalodekooda Sedhamaakaadhirundhaal.
32 pinnum Naan Enna Solluven? Gidhiyon, Paaraak, Simson, Yepdhaa, Thaaveedhu, Saamuvel Enbavargalaiyum, Theerkkadharisigalaiyunkuriththu Naan Vivaranchollavendumaanaal Kaalam Podhaadhu.
33 visuvaasaththinaale Avargal Raajyangalai Jeyiththaargal, Needhiyai Nadappiththaargal, Vaakkuththaththangalai Petraargal, Singangalin Vaaigalai Adaiththaargal,
34 akkiniyin Ukkiraththai Aviththaargal, Pattayakkarukkukkuth Thappinaargal, Balaveenaththil Balankondaargal, Yuththaththil Vallavargalaanaargal, Anniyarudaiya Senaigalai Muriyadiththaargal.
35 sthireegal Saagakkoduththa Thangaludaiyavargalai Uyirodezhundhirukkappetraargal; Verusilar Menmaiyaana Uyirththezhudhalai Adaiyumpadikku, Vidudhalaipera Sammadhiyaamal, Vaadhikkappattaargal;
36 veru Silar Nindhaigalaiyum Adigalaiyum Kattugalaiyum Kaavalaiyum Anubaviththaargal;

37 kalleriyundaargal, Vaalaal Aruppundaargal, Pareetchaipaarkkappattaargal, Pattayaththinaale Vettappattu Mariththaargal, Semmariyaattu Tholgalaiyum Vellaattu Tholgalaiyum Porththukkondu Thirindhu, Kuraivaiyum Ubaththiravaththaiyum Thunbaththaiyum Anubaviththaargal;
38 ulagam Avargalukku Paaththiramaayirukkavillai; Avargal Vanaandharangalileyum Malaigalileyum Kugaigalileyum Boomiyin Vedippugalileyum Sidharundu Alaindhaargal.
39 ivargalellaarum Visuvaasaththinaale Narsaatchipetrum, Vaakkuththaththampannappattadhai Adaiyaamarponaargal.
40 avargal Nammaiyallaamal Pooranaraagaadhapadikku Viseshiththa Nanmaiyaanadhondrai Dhevan Namakkendru Munnadhaaga Niyamiththirundhaar.
